attributes.action: Online Study from Homes for School’s students during Corona Virus Crisis in UK
attributes.additional_details: Children in UK should not be sent to schools
attributes.background: Online Education System in UK (Study from Homes) should start during  Corona Virus Crisis instead sending our children to schools in UK.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has announced that primary schools, secondary schools and colleges across England must move to remote provision from tomorrow, except for vulnerable children and the children of key workers: https://www.gov.uk/government/speeches/prime-ministers-address-to-the-nation-4-january-2021
